Сам суженый знатного рода, но вырос в горной деревне, и, чтобы обрести городской шик и приобщиться к цивилизации, отныне будет жить с ними – а вот, кстати, и он. А раз так, незачем спешить - надо разобраться в себе и дать парню шанс. But something’s wrong! Stress hormones keep yelling at him to go faster. The blood vessels are crusted over with cholesterol. Ulcers, fatty liver, trouble (ahem) downstairs … It’s hard for a cell to keep working when every day is a CODE BLACK!  \n  \nThe manga and anime Cells at Work! showed you what happens when a young, healthy body gets in trouble … but what if the body wasn’t so young, and was never very healthy? Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !\n\n\nLa lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... For Peony, an avid fan of *The Song of Askar*, the answer is simple: Marry her favorite character, of course! Reincarnated as the princess of the Kingdom of Garten, Peony is determined to marry Richt, the second male lead of *The Song of Askar* and former prince of the Fairspren Empire, who was banished to an inhospitable land after the novel’s happy ending (which didn’t end so well for him). In the same city, a young woman named Shizuka, who had lost her parents in the war, is a dancing girl and prostitute. One night, a man called Torazou paid for her company, but he did not sleep with her. Instead, he talked with her, and began to teach her to read and write. What will become of their relationship?  \n  \n2) Akatsuki no Kanata ni  \nThe time is 1183, during the Genpei war. Tomoe has always been a very masculine girl, and she can outfight and outdrink many men. Since childhood, she's been by the side of Minamoto no Yoshinaka, who she has come to love. Now that they're adults, Yoshinaka is a Genji general and Tomoe fights by his side. However, war is a dangerous time for love…  \n  \n3) Kimi Itohoshi  \nThe time is 1184, during the Genpei war. Self-sufficient Kaede lives alone on a mountain, with only her hawk Kakeru for company. Her solitude is broken by Yoshitsune's Genji army when one of the soldiers, the young Nasu no Yoichi, blunders into her hunting grounds. She allows herself to be drawn into the army's world, crushing on Yoshitsune and treating Yoichi as a little brother. Suas vidas pacatas estavam em harmonia, até que Tsukimi, a otaku por águas-vivas, aceita a ajuda de uma pessoa do tipo mais temido e odiado pelas fujoshis: uma princesa de Tóquio.||"},"links":{"al":"47904","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074CC58G9","ap":"princess-jellyfish","bw":"series/5331","cdj":"http://www.cdjapan.co.jp/searches?term.cat_id=UD-14-06-02\u0026page=\u0026agg_use=media_submedia\u0026agg_use=cat_ids_hierarchal_treeish_foldable\u0026term.media=BOOK\u0026term.media_format=\u0026q=%E3%81%8F%E3%82%89%E3%81%92%E3%81%B2%E3%82%81","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/120483/","engtl":"https://comics.inkr.com/title/231-princess-jellyfish?utm_source=mgd","kt":"5531","mal":"17904","mu":"38146","raw":"https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000004534"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Workers"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

f8763957-ad7b-4cfe-867d-8de80c9dcea2:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f8763957-ad7b-4cfe-867d-8de80c9dcea2","title":{"en":"Frenzy Leveling Up System"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Crazy Upgrade System"},{"zh-ro":"Fēngkuáng Shēngjí Xìtǒng"},{"zh":"疯狂升级系统"},{"zh-ro":"Fengkuang Shengji Xitong"},{"en":"Crazy Leveling System"}],"lastChapter":"106","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"Despite being the young lord of Merak Palace, Yi Tianyun is considered a weakling and an outcast by all those around him. The only person who cares about him is the master of the palace and his aunt, Shi Xueyun. f89d8073-840f-4a5b-ac4a-d57273ea5fed:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f89d8073-840f-4a5b-ac4a-d57273ea5fed","title":{"en":"Fountain of Love: Tales of the Voice of Flowers"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Rensen - Hana no Koe Yowa"},{"zh-ro":"Lian Quan - Hua Qing Qu Yu Hua"},{"ja-ro":"Rensen"},{"fr":"Un destin clément"},{"ja":"恋泉 花情曲余話"},{"zh":"戀泉- 花情曲餘話"}],"lastChapter":"4","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIds":["01939907-5f6e-4007-8a6f-220085de3d96"],"description":{"en":"A collection of four stories from Chinese folklore. Three of them (A Mercy Destiny, The Madman of the Flowers. and The Origin of Love) have the same characters that appeared in Hana no Koe: Dai-Chun, Song Gui-Xiang, and Ru-Chun in the Tang Dynasty. Dai-Chun and Song try to help their friends to solve their problems of vanity, pride, egoism, and envy, but Song's naivete complicates the situation."},"links":{"al":"49830","ap":"rensen-hana-no-koe-yowa","kt":"8229","mal":"19830","mu":"11550"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

f89ed57a-e4c0-48f5-b664-8ef88aa87fd9:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f89ed57a-e4c0-48f5-b664-8ef88aa87fd9","title":{"ko-ro":"Ibeon Saengeun Gajuga Doegetseumnida"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"이번 생은 가주가 되겠습니다"},{"en":"I Shall Master This Family"},{"en":"In This Life, I Will Be the Lord"},{"en":"I’ll Be the Matriarch in This Life"},{"en":"In This Life, I’ll Become the Head of the Family"},{"fr":"En cette vie, je deviendrai la cheffe de famille"},{"pt":"Nesta vida, serei a matriarca"},{"pt-br":"Nesta vida, eu serei a matriarca"},{"pt-br":"Serei a matriarca nessa vida"},{"uk":"Цього разу я господарка свого життя"},{"uk":"Цього разу я володарка свого життя"},{"uk":"У цьому житті я очолю родину"},{"ru":"В этой жизни я - глава семьи"},{"ru":"На сей раз я - хозяйка этой жизни"},{"ru":"Я стану хозяйкой этой жизни"},{"th":"เกิดใหม่ชาตินี้ฉันจะเป็นเจ้าตระกูล"},{"ja":"今世は当主になります"},{"mn":"Энэ удаагийн амьдралаа би захирна"},{"mn":"Энэ удаагийн амьдралаа би захирах болно"},{"zh":"这一世我来当家主"},{"zh":"今生我会成为家主"},{"zh-hk":"今生我來當家主"},{"vi":"Lần này, tôi sẽ trở thành gia chủ"},{"vi":"Lần này, tôi sẽ trở thành Matriarch"},{"vi":"Lần này, tôi sẽ trở thành mẫu hệ"},{"es":"Seré la matriarca en esta vida"},{"es":"En esta vida seré la soberana"},{"fr":"Cette fois-ci, je serais la Matriarche"},{"fr":"La nouvelle cheffe de clan (piccoma)"},{"ja-ro":"Konyo Ha Toshu Ni Narimasu"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl","en","es-la","fr","pt-br","uk","cs","id","ru","vi"],"description":{"cs":"Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. After the death of its patriarch, the fate of the family and that of Firentia, born from a Lombardi and a peasant, fall to ruin at the hands of her useless and cruel cousins. But when she’s reincarnated as her seven-year-old self, she’ll work to protect the family’s honor, gain her grandpa Lulac’s favor, and prevent her own father’s death. In this lifetime, there’s only one way for her to win: become the head of their mighty household.\n\n*Source: Tapas*\n\n---\n**Links:**\n* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)","fr":"Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.\n\nElle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!\n\n---\nLa grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? ภาษาไทย](https://www.wecomics.in.th/comics/15402/)","uk":"\"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину.\" Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. \"Це занадто...\" Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? f8a26fa2-2dec-43b8-a1a0-9e72c8da7425:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f8a26fa2-2dec-43b8-a1a0-9e72c8da7425","title":{"en":"Crime and Punishment"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"罪と罰"},{"ja-ro":"Tsumi to Batsu"},{"es":"Crimen y Castigo"},{"ru":"Преступление и наказание"},{"zh":"罪與罰"},{"de":"Schuld und Sühne"},{"fr":"Crime et Châtiment"},{"it":"Delitto e Castigo"},{"ar":"الجريمة والعقاب"},{"ko":"죄와 벌"},{"ko-ro":"joewa beol"},{"pt":"Crime e Castigo"}],"lastChapter":"5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es","en"],"relatedIds":["681a91ae-c445-421e-b052-caf9fbb92bfe","8b6dec10-86c6-4f62-9129-f0abbbc39dce"],"description":{"en":"An adaptation of Fyodor Dostoyevsky's classic Crime and Punishment, reworked for younger readers.  \n  \nThe setting is St. Petersburg in Czarist Russia, in the days just prior to the Russian Revolution.  \n  \nRascalnikov is a child from a poor family. He murders an old lady who is a loan shark and flees with her valuables. Judge Polifili, who has been assigned to the case, immediately suspects Rascalnikov because he had recently submitted an essay in a magazine claiming that \"the world is divided into those who are geniuses and those who are not. A genius may commit murder but is not guilty if it is for the good of the world.\"  \n  \nAt first, Rascalnikov feels invincible and confident that he can elude the law, but the Judge Polifili obstinately persists in his investigation, and gradually Rascalnikov comes to feel cornered. In the meantime, Sonya, a prostitute, frantically tries to persuade Rascalnikov to turn himself in.  \n  \nAll this takes place on the eve of the Russian Revolution.\n___\n**Additional Buy Links:**\n- 1977 version (The Complete Works of Tezuka Osamu Volume 10): [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4061086103)\n- 1995 Bunko Edition: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4041851254)\n\n**Alt Official English:** [eManga](https://emanga.com/products/crime-and-punishment-revised-edition?variant=32122389382)"},"links":{"al":"46754","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00JPXE2FM","ap":"crime-and-punishment","bw":"dedb188d5a-ffa0-464c-8207-ef17176c3667","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-84762","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/100459/","engtl":"https://comikey.com/comics/crime-and-punishment-manga/266/","kt":"crime-and-punishment","mal":"16754","mu":"48755"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

f8e294c0-7c11-4c66-bdd7-4e25df52bf69:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f8e294c0-7c11-4c66-bdd7-4e25df52bf69","title":{"en":"Blue Period"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ブルーピリオド"},{"ja-ro":"Buru Piriodo"},{"zh":"蓝色时期"},{"zh-hk":"藍色時期"},{"ar":"الحقبة الزرقاء"},{"ar":"النقطة الزرقاء"},{"fr":"Blue Period"},{"kk":"Көк Кезең"},{"ne":"नीलो अवधि"},{"fa":"دوره ی آبی"},{"pt-br":"O Período Azul"},{"ru":"Голубой период"},{"tr":"Mavi Dönem"},{"uk":"Блакитний період"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br","es-la","en","ru","id","tr","it","fa"],"relatedIds":["00010753-b98c-4f53-b09e-d09a8a385f20"],"description":{"de":"Sieh die Welt mit neuen Augen!\n\nYataro Yaguchi hat gute Noten – aber keine Leidenschaft. Er trinkt, raucht und treibt sich bis nachts in der Stadt herum. Aber glücklich macht ihn das nicht. Und nun, kurz vor dem Schulabschluss, muss er sich fragen, ob das wirklich alles ist, was er vom Leben zu erwarten hat.\n\nDa kommt er durch einen Zufall mit der Malerei in Kontakt – und plötzlich sieht er die Welt mit anderen Augen. Ohne jede Erfahrung beschließt er, sich für eine Kunstakademie zu bewerben. Doch die Aufnahmeprüfung ist hart… und ihm bleibt nicht mehr viel Zeit!","en":"Yatora is the perfect high school student, with good grades and lots of friends. It's an effortless performance, and, ultimately... a dull one. But he wanders into the art room one day, and a lone painting captures his eye, awakening him to a kind of beauty he never knew. Compelled and consumed, he dives in headfirst — and he's about to learn how savage and unforgiving art can be!\n___\n- **Won the 13th Manga Taisho Award in 2020**  \n- **Won the 44th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2020**","es":"Es un estudiante de bachillerato espabilado, popular, que saca muy buenas notas y tiene ideas pragmáticas sobre su futuro. También bebe, fuma y sale de juerga por las noches. Y un día, de repente, descubre el gozo de dibujar.\n\n¡Esta es la historia de superación de Yatora Yaguchi, repleta de vicisitudes en su camino para aprobar el examen de ingreso a una universidad de arte, en una versión de la tenacidad deportiva aplicada a las bellas artes!","fr":"Yatora est un lycéen studieux à qui tout réussit. Pourtant, il ressent depuis toujours une impression de vide en lui. Jusqu’au jour où, par hasard, il tombe sur un tableau qui le subjugue littéralement… Très vite, Yatora réalise que peindre est le seul moyen de faire passer ses émotions et de se révéler. Cet événement le pousse à se livrer corps et âme à la peinture pour tenter le concours d’entrée de la plus sélective des écoles de Beaux-arts !\n\n---\n\nMaison d'édition FR : **Pika**","it":"Un liceale dalla vita piena, che prende buoni voti, sa sempre come cavarsela, beve, fuma e ama la vita notturna... un bel giorno, sente dentro di sè risvegliarsi la passione per il disegno. Inizia così la storia di un ragazzo che farà ardere la propria gioventù, aspirando a entrare in un'università d'arte!\n\nPrima tiratura con in regalo il Quaderno d'artista.","ja":"成績優秀かつスクールカースト上位の充実した毎日を送りつつ、どこか空虚な焦燥感を感じて生きる高校生・矢口八虎（やぐち　やとら）は、ある日、一枚の絵に心奪われる。その衝撃は八虎を駆り立て、美しくも厳しい美術の世界へ身を投じていく。美術のノウハウうんちく満載、美大を目指して青春を燃やすスポ根受験物語、八虎と仲間たちは「好きなこと」を支えに未来を目指す！","pl":"Ma doskonałe stopnie i świetnie radzi sobie w życiu towarzyskim. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 6, Cap 25. ]","ru":"Можно ли увлечься чем-то настолько, что ради этого вдруг решишь свернуть с намеченного ранее жизненного пути? Если вдруг поймешь, что выбранная до этого дорога, хоть и сулила благополучие в будущем, но не отражала истинного желания?  \r\nС виду безалаберный Ятора Ягути на удивление своих друзей-разгильдяев преуспел в учёбе и по окончании школы мог поступить почти в любой университет. Однако сам парень большой радости от этого не испытывал. Велика задача — подтянуть предметы, нужно только приложить немного больше усилий, чем остальные. Скучно. Да и по мнению парня, гордиться тут нечем…  \r\nЖгучая потребность в самореализации и отсутствие очевидного способа самовыражения так и довлели бы над Яторой, если бы однажды вечером пагубная привычка не привела его в школьный клуб изобразительного искусства. Увидев там картину Мори, он решает попробовать запечатлеть на холсте приглянувшийся ему городской пейзаж. Неумелая, нелепая, но старательно написанная картина всё же достигает сердец некоторых людей, и парень понимает, что таким образом, через искусство, может по-настоящему общаться с другими.  \r\nТак стоит ли ради этого сворачивать с намеченного пути, даже если, вполне возможно, эта другая дорога в конце концов приведёт к пропасти?","th":"คะแนนสอบเป็นเลิศ มนุษยสัมพันธ์กับใครรอบข้างก็ไปได้ดี กินเหล้า สูบบุหรี่ เที่ยวกลางคืนทำได้ทุกอย่าง เพื่อนๆ ต่างก็สนิทสนมเชื่อใจ เขาเป็นเด็กผู้ชายในวัยม.ปลายที่ชีวิตดูกำลังไปได้สวยคนหนึ่ง\n\nทว่ามาวันหนึ่งเขากลับเพิ่งรู้ตัว่า ตนเองนั้นชอบวาดภาพ!?\n\nสุดยอดมังงะที่ตีแผ่เรื่องราวของเหล่าคนที่มุ่งมั่นในการสอบเข้ามหา'ลัยศิลปะ เปี่ยมล้นไปด้วยพลังของช่วงชีวิตวัยรุ่นเปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!","tr":"Lisenin sondan bir önceki sınıfında, çalışkan ama isteksiz Yatora Yaguchi, kendini sanat ile keşfediyor.
